task_description: Task to find an accessible home

must_have: Low-maintenance landscaping for ease of access
Adaptable home features for future needs
nice_to_have: Smart home technology for added convenience
Proximity to family or caregiver support
Lower countertops and cabinets for easier access
Close to healthcare facilities and services
deal_breakers: Insufficient natural light in the living spaces
Inadequate door widths for mobility devices

technical: Something with ramps or maybe wide doors
I think it should have some cool tech stuff
Not sure if it needs special floors or what
non_technical: Somewhere close to people who can help
Maybe it should be around parks or nature

must_meet: It has to be accessible, whatever that means
There should be no stairs, I think
I heard natural light is important but not sure how much
should_meet: I would like it to be near family, I think that's good
Maybe lower cabinets, but I don't really know

nice_to_meet: If it has smart tech, that's a plus
